CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Lundi' ), 'Lundi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Mardi' ), 'Mardi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Mercredi' ), 'Mercredi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Jeudi' ), 'Jeudi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Vendredi' ), 'Vendredi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Samedi' ), 'Samedi', '') & ' ' & IF( INCLUDES ( Jours__c , 'Dimanche' ), 'Dimanche', '')
CustomField.label: Prise hebdomadaire
